mapper.select: SELECT freecateNum, freecateName FROM freecate ORDER BY freecateNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freebbs(freeNum, userId, subject, content, freecateNum, hitCount, reg_date) VALUES(#{freeNum}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{freecateNum}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT freeNum, a.userId, userName, subject, content, reg_date, NVL(boardLikeCount, 0) boardLikeCount FROM freebbs a JOIN member1 m ON a.userId = m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT freeNum, COUNT(*) boardLikeCount FROM freebbsLike GROUP BY freeNum ) bc ON a.freeNum = ac.freeNum WHERE a.freeNum = #{freeNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE freebbs SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num = #{num}
